all_questions.question: Do you like karaoke?

You're running a marathon, and at the start you fall flat on your face!
What will you do?
You're at a movie theater. What are you there to see?
You've been asked to do a difficult task. What will you do?
Are you truly sincere when you apologize?

choices.answer: Uh, that's not easy to admit!

all_questions.question: Do you think you have good study habits?

choices.answer: Well, I never lose at sports!

all_questions.question:
There's a rumor around about a ghost haunting the school bathrooms!
What do you do?

Everyone's sharing a dessert, and there's an extra piece.
What do you do?
How are your mornings?

Everyone around you is laughing hard
at something you think is pretty boring. What do you do?
Do you like lively parties?

The people at the next table are singing for someone's birthday.
What do you do?

You're in a completely silent assembly when
you suddenly hear someone fart! How do you react?

choices.answer: Try to let it go by...

all_questions.question: Where do your prefer to play?

You're hiking up a mountain when you reach diverging paths.
Which kind do you take?
You see a big and comfortable bed. Your first reaction is to...

You discover a beat-up-looking treasure chest in some ruins.
What do you do?
Your friend takes a spectacular fall! What do you do?

You're daydreaming...when your friend sprays you with water!
What do you do?

Have you ever thought that if you dug in your backyard
you could find buried treasure?
Have you ever told a joke that just completely fell flat?

Your friend has made a meal that tastes terrible.
They ask, 'How is it?' You say...

You run into a new person that you haven't
talked to very much before. What do you do?

choices.answer: Make an excuse to get away.

all_questions.question: Have you ever realized you were hogging the conversation?

choices.answer: No, I know when to listen.

all_questions.question: You see a switch. What do you do?
You find something at a great bargain price! What do you do?

choices.answer: Try to haggle to a lower price.

all_questions.question:
You're packing your friend's snacks for a picnic
when you get hungry. What do you do?

choices.answer: Hold myself back and finish packing.
What snacks? The ones I just ate?

all_questions.question: Do you want to be taller someday?
Do you think it's important to always aim to be the best?

choices.answer: No, it's okay to not be.

all_questions.question:
Have you ever looked at your reflection in a mirror
and thought, 'What a cool person'?
If you saw someone doing something bad, could you scold them?
Do you prefer to be busy or to have a lot of free time?

You notice that something you bought for full price yesterday
is marked down to half price today! How do you feel?

You're about to buy a popular game when someone else
gets the last copy! How do you feel?

You've just stuffed yourself with a good meal
when a great dessert arrives. What do you do?

choices.answer: Eat it. Who cares if I'm full?
Turn it down, it's too fattening!

all_questions.question: You have a really important test tomorrow! What do you do?

choices.answer: Test?! I think I have a fever...

all_questions.question: Your friend is running a little late to meet you. Is that OK?
Do you think that, no matter what, life goes on?
The phone's ringing! What do you do?

choices.answer: Ignore it and let it ring.

all_questions.question:
Your friends seem to be making plans to hang out,
just out of earshot. You think...
Do you want to be famous?
Have you ever forgotten you bought something and bought another one?
Once you've decided something, do you see it through to the end?
Have you ever said 'nice to meet you' to someone you've met previously?

choices.answer: No, I remember those I've met.

all_questions.question: Do you think it's important to be fashionably late?
You've won big on a raffle ticket! You say...

Your friend suddenly won't listen to you,
when everything was fine yesterday. What happened?

You take off your shoes to realize your socks
are two different colors! What do you do?

choices.answer: Ha, I meant to do that!

all_questions.question:
You fail miserably! Everyone found out,
and they're disappointed in you... What do you do?

Have you ever blurted something out without
thinking about the consequences first?

You're in a meeting when you realize that
you really have to go to the restroom! What do you do?

choices.answer: Hold on until the meeting ends!

all_questions.question: Your friend offers to treat you to dinner. What do you say?

You see a cake that is past its expiration date,
but only by one day. What do you do?

choices.answer: Get someone to try it first.

all_questions.question: You're eating at a very fancy restaurant. Which course do you select?

You're in the final mile of a marathon, but
the last stretch is exhausting! What will you do?
Would you ever consider sticking to a plan to do ten sit-ups a day?

choices.answer: No! Why would I do that?!

all_questions.question: You have to move a heavy suitcase. What will you do?
If you don't know something, do you come clean and admit it?

choices.answer: No, that's not easy to admit.

all_questions.question:
A fortune-teller says that you have a bad
future ahead of you. How do you react?
You hear a rumor that might make you rich! What do you do?
Do you state your opinion even when it's not what everyone else thinks?

You're on a stroll when a TV crew pounces on you
for an interview. What do you do?

choices.answer: Ham it up! I'm on TV, woohoo!

all_questions.question: You see a parade coming down the street. What do you do?

Your friend tells a joke that's horribly corny!
How do you react?

You feel a burst of happiness! How about
expressing it with a little dance?
Can you strike up conversations with new people easily?

choices.answer: I'd rather talk to those I know.

all_questions.question: Do you get injured a lot?

choices.answer: Yes, and I'm used to it!

all_questions.question: What do you think of jungle exploration?
You discover a secret passage in a basement. What do you do?
What do you feel about communicating with aliens from another planet?
Have you ever upset a friend when you were just kidding around?

choices.answer: No, I try to mind others.

all_questions.question:
You think you hear someone call your name.
But no one's around...so what was it?
What do you do when you hear a friend is talking negatively about you?
Are you a rebel at heart?
When walking in a group, do you tend to be the one at the front?

choices.answer: I'd rather stay at the back.

all_questions.question: Do you think that you might be a genius?
Are you a city person or a country person?

You're about to take the last cookie when your friend wolfs it down!
What do you do?

choices.answer: I weep for my lost cookie.

all_questions.question: You don't get bothered by noise and ruckus nearby, do you?

choices.answer: I can't work if there's noise!

all_questions.question: Do you find yourself humming or singing often?
Would you rather be the center of attention or a wallflower?
Do you have lots of stuff you bought, thinking it was all cool, but don't use anymore?

choices.answer: I only keep what I need.

all_questions.question: When did you discover your current hobbies?
Do you often cancel plans to meet others at the last second?
Do you like to do things according to plan?
Do you think that lies are sometimes necessary and good?
Your friend is crying right in front of you! What made that happen?

choices.answer: My friend fell down, no doubt!
I wonder if it's my fault?

all_questions.question: Your friend says your shirt is inside out. What do you do?
Do you think that anything goes when it comes to winning?
Do you forget to lock the door when you go out?
Have you ever accidentally revealed a personal secret that someone shared with you?

choices.answer: All secrets are safe with me.

all_questions.question: You're in a play with friends. What kind of role do you prefer?
You attend a fine dinner at a friend's house. How do you behave?

choices.answer: Enjoy the meal in polite moderation.
